title: I want to share detail's of the Cast and Crew, what can I do? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
We can sort this out in a jiffy!
Production houses and movie makers can drop us an email at
synopsis@bookmyshow.com
along with the details they wish to get updated on, and our team will take care of it for them.
Please note: We do not charge any money for listing movies or artists. Kindly beware of the fraudsters and middlemen trying to extract money in the name of BookMyShow. Contact us directly at
